abstract: Haier, the largest Chinese maker of home appliances, plans not to bid for General Electric‘s appliances unit until it sees clear signs of a market recovery in the United States, Reuters reported, citing people with direct knowledge of the matter.
lead_paragraph: Haier, the largest Chinese maker of home appliances, plans not to bid for General Electric‘s appliances unit until it sees clear signs of a market recovery in the United States, Reuters reported, citing people with direct knowledge of the matter.

headline.main: Haier Holds Off on Bid for G.E. Unit, Report Says
